name_abbreviation: Wuthrick v. Ass'n of Pennsylvania State Colleges & University Faculties

parties: Marjorie A. WUTHRICK, Appellant v. ASSOCIATION OF PENNSYLVANIA STATE COLLEGES & UNIVERSITY FACULTIES, a.k.a. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of March, 2010, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
991 A.2d 308
Marjorie A. WUTHRICK, Appellant v. ASSOCIATION OF PENNSYLVANIA STATE COLLEGES & UNIVERSITY FACULTIES, a.k.a. APSCUF, an Unincorporated or Professional Association, the Pennsylvania State System of Higher Education, a Public Corporation and Agency of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Jace Condravy, individually, and as President of Slippery Rock University APSCUF, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 24, 2010.
